snippet: Judith Newman’s hard-sought Wikipedia page went live at about 9:15 Pacific Standard Time. About 20 minutes later she got an email, “It was just vandalized, but don’t worry, I flagged it.”
lead_paragraph: Judith Newman’s hard-sought Wikipedia page went live at about 9:15 Pacific Standard Time. About 20 minutes later she got an email, “It was just vandalized, but don’t worry, I flagged it.”

headline.seo: A Wikipedia Page for Judith Newman Is Approved
